Package com.myPack

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.myPack.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
this is the important class of the program which controls every disk in the map and players status and checks the game in every turn and also changes the turn.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board​(int numberOfPlayers, int level, int graphicType)
    the main constructor of the class for creating each fields value.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeDisks​(Disk tempDisk)
    this method will get a disk from the placeDisk method that had a valid place.
    void changeInput​(java.lang.String input)
    this method will get the input from the user and will change it to what we want and then it calls the placeADisk method for putting it into the board and do what is necessary.
    boolean checkEndGame()
    this method is for checking if the game is finished or not
    void checkGame()
    this method will check for the Pass and the end game
    boolean checkLine​(int line, Disk tempDisk)
    this method will check if there is any line between the input disk and any other disk in the map in the direction which we call it line.
    void findHintHouses()
    this method will check all the same type disk of the player turn disks.
    void firstBuild()
    this method is for building the first plain board map with the status of -1 for each house ( Means it is empty ) and the four middle house are full with black and white disks.
    int foundBestHouse()
    This method will chose the best house for computer to put the disk.
    int getNumberOfPlayers()
    this is for getting the number of players and it is important for single player mod.
    int getPlayerTurn()
    this is a getter method for getting the turn.
    void makeInput()
    this is the mode when we play against computer
    void placeADisk​(int xRow, int yCol)
    this method will get the x and y coordinates after using changeInput method and will check for the place of disk and will place it or will give us and error and then will change all of the disks that needed a change by placing this disk.
    void printOutput()
    in this method we will use our print class and we will print the board in cmd
    void printTheScores()  
    void searchLine​(int line, int xRow, int yCol, Disk tempDisk)
    This is a recursive function.
    void showOutput​(int xRow, int yCol)
    This is for showing what has computer chose to play.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerTurn

      public int getPlayerTurn()
      this is a getter method for getting the turn.
      Returns:
      the turn of the round

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()
      this is for getting the number of players and it is important for single player mod.
      Returns:
      the number of players

    • firstBuild

      public void firstBuild()
      this method is for building the first plain board map with the status of -1 for each house ( Means it is empty ) and the four middle house are full with black and white disks.

    • findHintHouses

      public void findHintHouses()
      this method will check all the same type disk of the player turn disks. And will locate the houses which we are able to put new Disks.

    • changeInput

      public void changeInput​(java.lang.String input)
      this method will get the input from the user and will change it to what we want and then it calls the placeADisk method for putting it into the board and do what is necessary.
      Parameters:
      input - the user input base on the map

    • placeADisk

      public void placeADisk​(int xRow, int yCol)
      this method will get the x and y coordinates after using changeInput method and will check for the place of disk and will place it or will give us and error and then will change all of the disks that needed a change by placing this disk.
      Parameters:
      xRow - the x coordinate
      yCol - the y coordinate

    • changeDisks

      public void changeDisks​(Disk tempDisk)
      this method will get a disk from the placeDisk method that had a valid place. Then we are going to make the changes in the board that this disk made. We a have a constant place then we check the others based on that place. This method will use the searchLine method too.
      Parameters:
      tempDisk - the disk we put

    • checkLine

      public boolean checkLine​(int line, Disk tempDisk)
      this method will check if there is any line between the input disk and any other disk in the map in the direction which we call it line.
      Parameters:
      line - each direction from our 8 directions
      tempDisk - the disk we put
      Returns:
      true or false

    • searchLine

      public void searchLine​(int line, int xRow, int yCol, Disk tempDisk)
      This is a recursive function. We have an algorithm to change the disks : this will pick each 8 directions around the disk that we say it is a line and will change the disks in this line till we reach A same type disk. Cause we check the line before we are sure that we are getting to a disk in this direction.
      Parameters:
      line - one direction from the 8 ( up / down / left / right / up-right / up-left / down-right / down-left )
      xRow - the x coordinate where we at
      yCol - the y coordinate where we at
      tempDisk - the disk we put

    • checkGame

      public void checkGame()
      this method will check for the Pass and the end game

    • checkEndGame

      public boolean checkEndGame()
      this method is for checking if the game is finished or not
      Returns:
      true or false

    • printOutput

      public void printOutput()
      in this method we will use our print class and we will print the board in cmd

    • printTheScores

      public void printTheScores()

    • makeInput

      public void makeInput()
      this is the mode when we play against computer

    • foundBestHouse

      public int foundBestHouse()
      This method will chose the best house for computer to put the disk.
      Returns:
      the index of hint disk in the list

    • showOutput

      public void showOutput​(int xRow, int yCol)
      This is for showing what has computer chose to play.
      Parameters:
      xRow - the x coordinate of board
      yCol - the y coordinate of board
